title: Kick your summer into high gear with $70 off AirPods Pro
content:
Macworld

Whether you’re lounging at the beach or hiking in the woods, good music can always make it better. Today Amazon is selling the 2nd-gen AirPods Pro with a USB-C charging case for $180, a savings of $69, and one of the few times we’ve ever seen this model drop to this price.

The design hasn’t changed since the original model arrived in 2019 but the 2nd-gen buds have longer battery life (6 hours vs 4.5 hours), enhanced spatial audio, Adaptive Transparency mode, and improved 2X noise cancellation. Along with a case that has USB-C for charging, the updated 2nd-gen AirPods Pro also bring better dust resistance and lossless audio for Vision Pro. Otherwise, it has fantastic noise cancelation and audio and a slew of fun features like Conversation Boost and Adaptive Audio. 

In our 4.5-star review, we declared the 2nd-gen AirPods Pro as “the best choice for those who use Apple products,” but at the price, it’s great for everyone else too.
